MODULE.name: AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_DTS_DRC
MODULE.description: ID of the DTS_DRC module.\nThis module supports the AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_DTS_DRC_RATIO#[ #] parameter ID.\n

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_DTS_DRC_RATIO
PARAMETER.description: Specifies the DTS DRC_ratio used by the DRC.\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_ratio
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the DTS DRC_ratio used by the DRC.\nIf this value is greater than 4, the DRC is enabled. Otherwise, it is bypassed.\n
